palawa hala sar rajuge adhirajyawadi yuda aramunuwalata ha jayaga්rahanaya dakwa yuddhaya pawathwa gena yamata aanduwe athi kapawima pilibanda pa්rathignya dun kadet pakshaye nayaka ha widesha amathi pawel miliyukowge lipiya pa්rakashayata path wu kalhi, sowiyat sabhawanhi menshewik ha samaja-wiplawakari nayakayange sahaya matha randa pawathi thawakalika aanduwa, aprel masaye di siya pa්rathama pa්radhana deshapalana arbudayata muhuna dunneya.
eya samanga satankala hakke mardanayata sahaya dimen nowa yahapath janamadhya athi kirimen saha ewani madhyanta sahaya dimen pamani.
sudu adhirajyawadin balayen iwathwa yana wita balaya himiwanne parani radala pelapathwalata saha aluthin mudal upayagath konthrathkara dhanapathiyan wethataya.
